title: Katrina Kaif Turns Into A Barber, Dear Zindagi's Deleted Scene & More From The World Of Ent! - Indiatimes.com
text:
February 05, 2017 1. This Deleted Scene From Dear Zindagi Will Make You Look At Life From A Different Perspective! 
Recently, a deleted scene from Dear Zindagi emerged on the social media circuit. Shot in the ruins of a fort in Goa, this scene features the adorable Jugs aka SRK imparting his wisdom to Kyra aka Alia. Despite it being a little bit of a history lesson, it has an underlying message that will make you look at life differently. Without further ado, here's the scene: 2. Pirate Of Lavishness! Johnny Depp's Monthly Expenditure Is Over 13 Cr, 20 Lac Is Spent On Wine 
Here are the details of his overtly high expenditures: 1. $75 million (over Rs 500 crore) on 14 residences spread all across the world 2. An expenditure of $18 million (over Rs 120 crore) to buy and renovate a 150-foot yacht 3. $30,000 (Rs 20 lakh) a month on "expensive wine" that the Pirates Of The Caribbean actor gets flown from around the globe for his "personal consumption" 4. “Depp also paid over $3 million to blast from a specially made cannon the ashes of author Hunter S. Thompson over Aspen, Colo.,” the lawsuit also alleges. 5.In addition to the above, throughout the years, Depp supported his friends, family and certain employees at a cost of over $10 million 3. Jackie Chan's Stunt Team Reunites With Him After A Decade, Pays Him A Tear-Jerking Tribute! 
Last year in November, 62-year-old Jackie Chan was awarded an honorary Oscar. In his acceptance speech, Chan had thanked the members of his Jackie Chan Stunt Team for their loyalty and devotion to a dangerous craft. "After 56 years in the film industry, making more than 200 films, after so many bones, finally," Chan had said in his acceptance speech. Returning the favour, his fellow stuntmen, some who have been with him since the 1970s, paid a tribute to the daredevil in a moving video. 4.
